title: 'Tis the season to get crafty!
desc: 'Tis the season to get crafty! What better way to spread some Christmassy joy to your friends and family than with a home-made card! ?Get creative with Art Smart Workshops and make your own very special Christmas cards using mixed media and collage techniques.? Suitable for children aged 6-11 Please note:  If you can no longer attend, please cancel your ticket and?free up the space for another person. Check your confirmation email for instructions or  click here If this event sells out, you can add yourself to the waitlist and you will be contacted if a space becomes available.
